Flow.description: [26-Jun-2024] - Edit condition for getting TRCR from metadata (Element: GetTRCRMetadata). - Edit condition for getting TRCR S/H from metadata (Element: GetTRCRSHMetadata). - Edit condition for getting FALB from metadata (Element: GetFALBMetadata). - Edit condition for getting FALB S/H from metadata (Element: GetFALBSHMetadata). - Edit condition for getting TXFA S/H from metadata (Element: GetTXFASHMetadata).

formulas.name: FmlNotifybody
formulas.expression: {!GetRequestItemRecord.Name} +" "+ "is submitted to you. Please provide your approval to proceed further."

formulas.name: FmlNotifySubject
formulas.expression: "Request Number"+" "+{!GetRequestItemRecord.Name}+" "+" is submitted to you. Please provide your approval to proceed further."

Flow.label: CTRTRCRSubmitEditfCounterPartyforApproval

textTemplates.name: LABIXEmailbody
textTemplates.text:
Dear All,

Kindly inform LABIX has request to edit information of {!GetRequestItemRecord.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}
Please see the detail and proceed via this link.

Best Regards,
Counterparties Registration Automated System
This is an automatic generated email. Please do not reply to this address.

textTemplates.name: LABIXEmailBodySH
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!GetRequestItemRecord.CreditOwnerSectionHead__r.FirstName} {!GetRequestItemRecord.CreditOwnerSectionHead__r.LastName},

Please kindly approve to edit information of {!GetRequestItemRecord.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}
Please see the detail and proceed via this link.

Best Regards,
Counterparties Registration Automated System
This is an automatic generated email. Please do not reply to this address.
